title: Failed to work with X3 type of UAV

content.raw:
Hi,
I am trying to launch one X3 UAV. During the launch I am getting the below message on competition.launch terminal.

'''
[Dbg] [gazebo_ros_interface_plugin.cpp:184] Connecting Gazebo topic "~/X3_1/imu/data" to ROS topic "X3_1/imu/data".
Segmentation fault (core dumped)
[gazebo-1] process has died [pid 27405, exit code 139, cmd /opt/ros/melodic/lib/gazebo_ros/gzserver -e ode --verbose /home/baila/subt_ws/install/share/subt_gazebo/worlds/tunnel_practice_1.world __name:=gazebo __log:=/home/baila/.ros/log/75a7bb1a-6364-11e9-923e-68a3c4a1e180/gazebo-1.log].
log file: /home/baila/.ros/log/75a7bb1a-6364-11e9-923e-68a3c4a1e180/gazebo-1*.log
'''

And my Update function for the node executed just for once. 

Is there any issue with X3 launch?
content.html:
Hi, I am trying to launch one X3 UAV. During the launch I am getting the below message on competition.launch terminal.

''' [Dbg] [gazebo_ros_interface_plugin.cpp:184] Connecting Gazebo topic "~/X3_1/imu/data" to ROS topic "X3_1/imu/data". Segmentation fault (core dumped) [gazebo-1] process has died [pid 27405, exit code 139, cmd /opt/ros/melodic/lib/gazebo_ros/gzserver -e ode --verbose /home/baila/subt_ws/install/share/subt_gazebo/worlds/tunnel_practice_1.world name:=gazebo log:=/home/baila/.ros/log/75a7bb1a-6364-11e9-923e-68a3c4a1e180/gazebo-1.log]. log file: /home/baila/.ros/log/75a7bb1a-6364-11e9-923e-68a3c4a1e180/gazebo-1*.log '''

And my Update function for the node executed just for once.

Is there any issue with X3 launch?
